previous.excerpt:
The stock has been around for years. Independent aircraft leasing company. Up
from $3 to $38 in one day. The CFO just released a statement saying the company
has no idea what is going on with the stock price.

30 million shares traded. 1.55M shares outstanding. Average daily volume 140k.

localize.title: 美元Acy今日上涨1300%无人声称知道原因
localize.the_new_excerpt:
这只股票已经存在多年了。独立飞机租赁公司。向上
一天之内从3美元涨到38美元。首席财务官刚刚发布了一份声明，称该公司
不知道股票价格是怎么回事。

成交量为3000万股。155万股流通股。日均成交量140K。
LOL。任何…
